CMS
Fear
Debilitation | IllusionDivination
  • Duration: Concentration
    Range: Touch
    AOE: Target creature

  • You burrow yourself into the mind of a creature, divulging its worst fear and looming it over their shoulder, filling it with consistent dread. It makes a Will contest against you and repeats the contest at the beginning of each turn for the spell’s duration. Each time the creature fails, it’s dealt 2d6 Psyche damage and feels as though it’s being followed by its worst fear. Upon succeeding, the spell ends.
